original_text: Already you have all you want! Already you have become rich! Without us you have become kings! And would that you did reign, so that we might share the rule with you!
korean_text: 너희가 이미 배 부르며 이미 풍성하며 우리 없이도 왕이 되었도다 우리가 너희와 함께 왕 노릇 하기 위하여 참으로 너희가 왕이 되기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: Already you have all you want!
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이미 원하는 것을 다 가졌구나!

sentences.original_text: Without us you have become kings!
And would that you did reign,
so that we might share the rule with you!
sentences.korean_translation: 우리도 너희와 함께 통치할 수 있게 말이다!
